data.title: Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer Luca Maestri salary at Apple Inc.
data.meta_description: Salary, bonuses, stock options and other compensation for Luca Maestri, Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer at Apple Inc.. How much did Luca Maestri make in 2023
data.text:
Employers Seeking efficiency in executive compensation benchmarking?

Unlock Efficiency in Executive Compensation Benchmarking with CompAnalyst Executive

CompAnalyst Executive

As Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer at Apple Inc., Luca Maestri made $26,935,883 in total compensation. Of this total $1,000,000 was received as a salary, $3,571,150 was received as a bonus, $0 was received in stock options, $22,323,641 was awarded as stock and $41,092 came from other types of compensation. This information is according to proxy statements filed for the 2023 fiscal year.
